ModMetaData.name: Configurable Neural Supercharger
ModMetaData.author: White_Phant0m
ModMetaData.description:
Someone wanted the Neural Supercharger to be faster, so I made it faster, twice as fast to be exact.
Also has settings to customise the cooldown & power cost.
Every 2500 ticks is an hour ingame. Default cooldown is 24h = 60000 ticks.
